svg.text: Data Science Era: Report Structure with Modern Methods
Modern Report Layout with Data Science Development Approaches (2013-present)

g.text: Customer acquisition cost decreased by 18% while maintaining
quality leads, resulting in improved ROI across all channels.
Increase investment in digital marketing channels by 25%
Expand customer success team to maintain NPS above 70
Implement automated reporting for real-time insights
Focus on retention strategies for high-value segments

â€¢ Spark/Kafka: Real-time streaming and big data
â€¢ Cloud platforms: AWS, GCP, Azure auto-scaling
SELECT date, region, SUM(sales) as total_sales
â€¢ Interactive dashboards: Tableau, PowerBI, Looker
â€¢ Web applications: Streamlit, Dash, Shiny
â€¢ APIs: Real-time data access, mobile integration
â€¢ Automated reports: Email, Slack, webhook delivery
